title: Perfect Rage
description: This is Connor's story.Unstable.Unpredictable.Consumed by perfect rage.I was fighting who I’d become and what I’d done.There was nothing I cared about except her.She was mine.But I’d forgotten her—my shutterbug.And I lost her. Until now.I’d do anything to possess her again. Anything to keep her safe.Protect her against my biggest opponent.The monster. Me.
author: Nashoda Rose
